title: India Leads with Innovation as AcademIQ.io Brings AI to Every Classroom
description: New Delhi [India], September 5: In 2025, artificial intelligence is no longer confined to labs and tech firms. It's making its way into real classrooms--transforming everything from how lessons are prepared to how students learn. From high-performing institutions in Europe to government schools in rural India, AI-powered learning platforms are quietly redefining modern education.

title: FT: OpenAI to make custom AI chips with Broadcom next year
description: OpenAI is partnering with Broadcom to manufacture its own artificial intelligence chips set for shipping in 2026.
content:
Sam Altman said that OpenAI would use ‘well over 1m GPUs’ by the end of 2025.
OpenAI has tapped chipmaker Broadcom to mass manufacture its own artificial intelligence chips set for shipping in 2026, the Financial Times has reported.

title: From Algorithms to Altars | How AI and SEO Are Transforming the Wedding Industry
description: The wedding industry might seem like the last place technology would dominate. After all, vows, venues, and champagne toasts feel a world away from algorithms and analytics. Yet, in 2025, the two are more connected than ever. Couples are planning online first, luxury venues are competing globally for attention, and artificial intelligence is reshaping the […]

title: US AI giant Anthropic bars Chinese-owned entities
description: Anthropic is barring Chinese-run companies and organisations from using its artificial intelligence services, the US tech giant said, as it toughened restrictions on "authoritarian regions."
content:

title: Civil servants refuse to use AI because of net zero concerns
description: Findings cast doubt on Labour’s plans to use artificial intelligence for Whitehall restructure
content:
A report found that civil servants are reluctant to use AI due to environmental concerns, casting doubt on Sir Keir Starmer’s plans to restructure Whitehall with it.

title: Donald Trump Inviting Bill Gates to White House Sparks MAGA Fury
description: The White House event was held to support an initiative on artificial intelligence led by First Lady Melania Trump.
content:
